characters.name: Bilbo Baggins
characters.description: A respectable hobbit who embarks on an unexpected adventure. Grows from comfort-loving homebody to brave adventurer.

personality.behavior_summary: Initially reluctant hero who discovers inner courage and wit during his journey.
personality.motivations: To help the dwarves and prove himself worthy
personality.character_arc: From timid hobbit to legendary adventurer

characters.name: Gandalf
characters.description: Wise and powerful wizard who guides the company. Known for his cunning plans and magical abilities.

personality.behavior_summary: Enigmatic mentor who guides others to discover their own strength.
personality.motivations: To help reclaim Erebor and defeat evil

characters.name: Thorin Oakenshield
characters.description: Proud dwarf leader seeking to reclaim his homeland and treasure. Noble but often stubborn.

personality.behavior_summary: Regal leader consumed by desire to reclaim his heritage, sometimes clouding his judgment.
personality.motivations: To reclaim Erebor and restore his people's glory
personality.character_arc: From proud warrior to treasure-obsessed king to redeemed hero
